note.p: Daughter of Thomas and Henrietta Butler of Bramdean, Hampshire. Married Arthur Mellersh in 1850.
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/626/65/17)
England, select births and christenings, 1538–1975 (Ancestry.com, accessed 29 November 2017)
